cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.controllers

Class ElasticsearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.controllers.ElasticsearchController

  • public class ElasticsearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    ElasticsearchController is a class containing classes that deal with saving Users using elasticsearch. All nested classes extend AsyncTask and are thus run ASYNCHRONOUSLY. ElasticsearchController should only be used within the Controller.
    See Also:
    User, Controller

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ElasticsearchController.CreateUserTask
      CreateUserTask is used to save a new User
      static class  ElasticsearchController.DeleteUserByIdTask
      DeleteUserByIdTask is used to delete the User with the supplied id
      static class  ElasticsearchController.DeleteUserTask
      DeleteUserTask is used to delete a User
      static class  ElasticsearchController.GetUserByInstrumentIdTask
      GetUserByInstrumentIdTask is used to search for the User that owns the supplied Instrument.
      static class  ElasticsearchController.GetUserByNameTask
      GetUserByNameTask is used to search for the User with the supplied username Returns an ArrayList of JSON strings that can be translated into Users using the Deserializer class.
      static class  ElasticsearchController.GetUserTask
      GetUserTask is used to search for the User with the supplied id Returns an ArrayList of JSON strings that can be translated into Users using the Deserializer class.
      static class  ElasticsearchController.SearchInstrumentsTask
      SearchInstrumentsTask is used to search all the Instruments already saved and find the ones containing the keywords that are separated by a space in the supplied string.
      static class  ElasticsearchController.UpdateUserTask
      UpdateUserTask is used to update the index of the User to reflect any new changes
